linkedin_outreach.message_template: Hi [Name], I'm a Full-Stack Developer with 15+ years of experience, including expertise in AI automation systems and sustainability technology. I'm particularly interested in [Company]'s [specific initiative/role]. Would you be open to a brief conversation about opportunities that align with my background in [relevant expertise]?
linkedin_outreach.follow_up_schedule: Initial outreach within 48 hours, follow-up after 1 week if no response

virtual_events: Remote work and digital transformation events

strategic_recommendations: Prioritize roles that combine AI/automation with client-facing responsibilities
Emphasize Alex AI results in applications (45% efficiency, 30% cycle time reduction)
Target companies with digital transformation initiatives
Focus on roles requiring both technical and business acumen
Leverage sustainability focus for companies with environmental initiatives
